Detailed Description

Group of Sched::Thread

Such object is created at the top level of the scheduling process.

void Sched::LocalThreadGroup::fill_localcollections ( Sched::Thread *  thread,
FILL_FLAG  flag 
)

Fill the LocalCollections with GlobalDatas from the Thread thread. It also creates the Callbacks and set the first readers and first writer to WAINTING state

const std::vector<RFO::Closure*>& Sched::LocalThreadGroup::get_local_receive_closures ( DFG::TagClosure  tag  )  const

Return the list of contextid that required to recv the data with tag The map is filled by fill_localcollections method invocation on each thread of the local thread group.
